com.schneewittchen.rosandroid.model.repositories.rosRepo

Class RosRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.schneewittchen.rosandroid.model.repositories.rosRepo.RosRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubNode.NodeListener

    public class RosRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements SubNode.NodeListener
    The ROS repository is responsible for connecting to the ROS master and creating nodes depending on the respective widgets.
    Version:
    1.1.3
    Author:
    Nico Studt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectToMaster()
      Connect all registered nodes and establish a connection to the ROS master with the connection details given by the already delivered master entity.
      void disconnectFromMaster()
      Disconnect all running nodes and cut the connection to the ROS master.
      androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<BaseData> getData() 
      static RosRepository getInstance(android.content.Context context)
      Return the singleton instance of the repository.
      androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<ConnectionType> getRosConnectionStatus()
      Get the current connection status of the ROS service as a live data.
      java.util.List<Topic> getTopicList()
      Get a list from the ROS Master with all available topics.
      void informWidgetDataChange(RosMessage data)
      Find the associated node and inform it about the changed data.
      void onData(org.ros.internal.message.Message newData) 
      void updateMaster(MasterEntity master)
      Change the connection details to the ROS master like the IP or port.
      void updateWidgets(java.util.List<BaseWidget> widgets)
      React on a widget change.

        Parameters:
